source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a grand, illuminated European courtyard at night. The focus is on a large, curved building with warm yellow lighting, which houses the Théâtre Édouard VII. In the center of the courtyard stands a prominent equestrian statue. The camera slowly pulls back, widening the view of the impressive architecture while a few people walk in the background.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: while crowd walk in the foreground and middle ground.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: The video should highlight the crowd walking in the foreground and middle ground for a more dynamic perspective.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: The video should highlight the crowd walking in the foreground and middle ground for a more dynamic perspective.
source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This video captures a vibrant European courtyard at night, centered around the grand Théâtre Édouard VII, beautifully illuminated with warm yellow lighting. The scene is brought to life by a bustling crowd walking in the foreground and middle ground, adding a dynamic perspective to the view. In the center of the courtyard stands a prominent equestrian statue, while the camera slowly pulls back to reveal the impressive architecture surrounding the lively scene.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video captures a vibrant European courtyard at night, centered around the grand Théâtre Édouard VII, beautifully illuminated with warm yellow lighting. The scene is brought to life by a bustling crowd walking in the foreground and middle ground, adding a dynamic perspective to the view. In the center of the courtyard stands a prominent equestrian statue, while the camera slowly pulls back to reveal the impressive architecture surrounding the lively scene.

bad_caption: This video shows a quiet city park during the early morning, with a large fountain in the center gently spraying water. A group of cyclists rides in a single file along a winding path, while a street vendor pushes a cart filled with balloons past a row of empty benches. The camera slowly pans upward to follow a flock of pigeons as they take off and fly above the treetops, revealing a distant skyline in the background.
